## setDriver

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/tasks/src/driver-manager.ts" sourceLine="112" packageName="@commandkit/tasks" />

Sets the global task driver.

This is a convenience function that sets the driver on the global task driver manager.



*Example*

```ts
import { setDriver } from '@commandkit/tasks';
import { HyperCronDriver } from '@commandkit/tasks/hypercron';

setDriver(new HyperCronDriver());
```

```ts title="Signature"
function setDriver(driver: TaskDriver): void
```
Parameters

### driver

<MemberInfo kind="parameter" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/tasks/interfaces/task-driver#taskdriver'>TaskDriver</a>`} />
